StyleCategoryDef.label: Imperial
StyleCategoryDef.description: The refined Imperial style reflects the diplomatic empire-builders of Cyrodiil, featuring red and gold Legion aesthetics with organized military designs and symbols of Imperial authority.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Breton
StyleCategoryDef.description: The scholarly Breton style embodies the magic-resistant people of High Rock, combining blue and silver academic colors with knightly designs that reflect their mixed elven-human heritage.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Nord
StyleCategoryDef.description: The hardy Nord style represents the fierce warriors of Skyrim, featuring grey and blue practical designs with Nordic patterns suited for harsh climates and independent living.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Redguard
StyleCategoryDef.description: The warrior Redguard style reflects the desert-dwelling fighters of Hammerfell, showcasing brown and bronze colors with curved weapon influences and designs adapted for harsh desert conditions.
